name: d3-area-label
description: A library for placing labels in areas.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -g d3-scale:d3,d3-array:d3 -o build/d3-area-label.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-area-label.js -c -m -o build/d3-area-label.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-area-label.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-area-label.js build/d3-area-label.min.js
